DOC.brief_summary: The purpose randomize , Phase 2 open-label study assess response rate participant Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2 ( Her2+ ) locally advanced and/or metastatic breast cancer ( previously treat chemotherapy trastuzumab ) treatment ixabepilone plus trastuzumab and/or docetaxel plus trastuzumab .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Combination Trastuzumab Ixabepilone Versus Trastuzumab Docetaxel Patients With Advanced and/or Metastatic Breast Cancer
